familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $157,947 in Brokerage commissions income from WESTMINSTER TITLE ASSOCIATES, LLC (Insurance brokerage license; Florham Park, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: WESTMINSTER TITLE ASSOCIATES, LLC (Insurance brokerage license; Florham Park, NJ)

familyMemberEthics.description:
Jared Kushner received $157,947 in brokerage commissions from WESTMINSTER TITLE ASSOCIATES, LLC
(Insurance brokerage license; Florham Park, NJ) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: WESTMINSTER TITLE ASSOCIATES, LLC (Insurance brokerage license; Florham Park, NJ)
